lines.text: Things only seem to be magic. There is no real magic. There's no real magic ever.

Do you believe God's whole world runs by the laws of the few sciences we have been able to discover? Oh, no, Christine, there is more. But people are satisfied. They know so much, they think they know all. And that makes it easy for Nosferatu. That makes it easy for all the devils.
Nosferatu. Vampire! First I will save your soul, then I will destroy you. I will show you your room.
A young man in the house with Christina? Related or not, I don't think it's right.
But Mrs Bellini...
You shouldn't have it, Cuda. How will it look?
It looks as you want it to look, Mrs Bellini. My family knows how to behave.
Everything has been pretty easy since I've learned how to be careful. People are the hardest thing.
I understand.
When I see people together, they don't talk. Not really. They don't say what they mean.
Right.

Then they, they have the other... the sexy stuff. Whenever they want. I've been much too shy to ever do the sexy stuff. I mean, do it with someone who's awake. Someday maybe I'll get to do it - awake - without the blood part. Just do it with somebody. Then be together and talk all night.
I don't suppose it's sacrilege to say the wine at St Vincents is putrid.
You were sent here or you asked to come?
I was sent by the diocese, when Father Carelli retired.
Retired? Huh! Father Carelli is younger than I am. He asked to leave. He left like the rest of them. He thinks this town is finished!

[With mock solemnity]
No, he has cancer. He's very near the end. In fact, I haven't heard, he may be gone.
[Crosses himself]
You want me here for sex, don't you. I never really did it before, I was always too shy. But I've decided I'd really like to do it with you.

I can't have kids. I can never have kids. I have something wrong inside. I don't know, what do you think? Is that good for me, bad for me? No opinion? That's why you're so nice to have around Martin. You don't have opinions.
If you need anything, just call me. I'll come, I'll send you the money.
No, you'll forget about me.
No, I won't. Why do you think I'll forget?
Because you're going away. People always go away so they can forget where they were.
Boy, do I wish what you had was catching.
Some people think it *is* catching. In the movies it's catching.
Live for yourself! Whatever it takes to get through the night. Right, count?
Are you making fun of me?
And that's another thing about those movies. Vampires always have ladies. Sometimes lots of ladies. Well, that's wrong too! You don't need all that.
Ah,ha,ha,ha, you don't need that?
No, you really don't. I mean, if the magic part was real and you could make them do whatever you wanted to...
Ha,ha,oh,yeah!
Well, that would be different. In real life, in real life you can't get people to do what you want them to do.
How old are you, Martin?
Oh, I'm old.
How old?
Eighty four.
Freak, rapist asshole!
You may come and go, but you will not take people from the city. If I hear of it, a single time, I will destroy you without salvation.
